user_query: I'm organizing a music-themed pub quiz and I need some challenging questions. Fetch the comments from SongMeanings for the song 'Hotel California' by Eagles to gather interesting facts. Moreover, search for tracks on Soundcloud using the query 'jazz music' to find some jazz classics to include in the quiz.

TaskList.description: Fetch comments from SongMeanings for the song 'Hotel California' by Eagles to gather interesting facts.
Search for tracks on Soundcloud using the query 'jazz music' to find some jazz classics.
